documents_dashboard_document_ID_IT: Photocopy of the front and back of a valid identity document (passport, national ID card).
documents_dashboard_document_PROOF_OF_AD: Proof of address with your full name and the address, as indicated in your profile, dated within the last 3 months (e.g., electricity or gas bill)
documents_dashboard_document_CORPORATE_I: Certificate of company registration with the Chamber of Commerce dated within the last 3 months, or any corresponding document.
documents_dashboard_document_ADMINISTRAT: Certificate of company registration with the Chamber of Commerce dated within the last 3 months, or any corresponding document.
documents_dashboard_document_ASSOCIATION: A copy of the company’s articles of association or similar document.
documents_dashboard_document_individual_: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
documents_dashboard_document_corporation: If you are not listed in the company’s certificate of registration with the Chamber of Commerce or the articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in official documents.
documents_dashboard_document_association: If you are not listed in the company’s certificate of registration with the Chamber of Commerce or the articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in official documents.
documents_dashboard_document_administrat: If you are not listed in the company’s certificate of registration with the Chamber of Commerce or the articles of association, you can attach a photocopy of the proof of identity of any person listed in official documents.
documents_dashboard_document_other_OTHER: Useful documents containing information about your circumstances (residential address, change of address, etc.)
